title: PQCrypto
extract: ► Literal meaning of cryptography: “secret writing”. ► Security goal #1: Confidentiality despite Eve's espionage. ► Security goal #2: Integrity, i.e., recognizing Eve's sabotage. https://pqcrypto.eu.org. Tanja Lange.Sep 28, 2018
extract_html: ► Literal meaning of cryptography: “secret writing”. ► Security goal #1: Confidentiality despite Eve's espionage. ► Security goal #2: Integrity, i.e., recognizing Eve's sabotage. https://pqcrypto.eu.org. Tanja Lange.Sep 28, 2018
